content.body: By my reading, there is no mathematical value "-0", only "0", and "negative zero" can only be expressed with a Number value "-0ğ”½". Can anyone confirm that?
Thanks, bakkot ! And if I'd been just a little more patient, I might have answered this for myself from 262: "The mathematical value of +0ğ”½ and -0ğ”½ is the mathematical value 0."
